item1.itemDescription: Hey Wally watchers! Join the hunt for Wally in this wonderful adventure! Take the Wally challenge and go up and down the Corridors of Time, wander the Fantastic Flower Garden, witness the Mighty Fruit Fight, visit Clown Town and see many other wondrous Wonderlands! Wally and friends are hiding in every detailed scene. Full of eye-boggling extras and hours of fun, this fifth classic Wally adventure comes with a striking new cover. Wow! Amazing!

item2.itemDescription: A table lamp with a built-in gravity sensor that resembles an “On/Off” switch, and toggles on and off accordingly as you press it.

item3.itemDescription: If only you could play Super Mario on this: a whiteboard and magnet set that will make your fridge resemble one of the original Game Boys.

item4.itemName: Personalizable Game of Thrones Music Box
item4.itemDescription: For the superfan who knows the Game of Thrones theme song by heart, a teeny laser-cut music box that you can wind up over and over again

item5.itemDescription: When you’re living in a shoe-box apartment with more people than you can handle, this zip-up sleeping pod will at least give you the illusion of your own space.

item6.itemDescription: Designed for slicing watermelon, cantaloupe, honeydew, pineapple,lemon,orange,pear and more.These melon tools make it that much easier to get into a daily habit of fruit servings for you and your family.Not only it can cut fruit but also bread,pie,pizza,and many kinds of vegetables!

item7.itemDescription: So you never have to aim and swat with a newspaper again, or get too close to their thousand eyes, a handy spider catcher that scoops them up at long range and keeps them in place with a glue trap until you’re ready to release them.

item8.itemDescription: Japanese candy that transforms from powder to an edible gummy, with a sour foam component, too — for the person who’s hooked on slime videos.

item9.itemDescription: A Star Wars collectible that’s functional as well: LED lightsaber chopsticks.

item10.itemDescription: For the indoor cat who wishes he were an outdoor cat, a suction-cup hammock that will let him survey his many winged enemies at close range.

item11.itemDescription: A tailgating tool that will chill any beer within 60 seconds — it beats lugging around a cooler filled with ice.

item12.itemDescription: This moon lamp appears to float in midair thanks to magnets, and can switch between brighter and dimmer modes. It would make a great gift for a kid’s bedroom.

item13.itemDescription: Perfect the dog selfie with this squeaking tennis-ball attachment that helps keep your pup focused on the camera — and also comes very well reviewed.

item14.itemDescription: This reusable coffee mug comes with two straps: a small hand strap and a long one so you can carry it across your body if your hands are full. And the coffee holder transforms into a stand for when you get to your destination. Genius!

item15.itemDescription: There are few things more annoying than having to turn the bright bathroom light on when you get up to go in the middle of the night. With this genius little toilet bowl light, you’ll be able to guide yourself to the loo without disturbing your sleep any more than necessary.

item16.itemDescription: If your cat likes to scratch everything in sight, this is the perfect item for you. Your cat will love using this “turntable” scratch pad — and your couch will finally stop getting clawed up every day.

item17.itemDescription: For a cute cooking method that keeps you healthy, all you have to do is place this microwave-safe silicone piggy on top of the ingredients in a pot to steam food.

item18.itemDescription: Hey, sometimes we all need a little extra shuteye, and this unique design creates the private environment necessary to take a power nap wherever you may be. Slip it on your head so the hole is in the front so you can breathe and then lay down on a flat surface and place your hands in the other two holes for optimal comfort.

item19.itemName: H2oVibe Rain Showerhead Jet with Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
item19.itemDescription: Your shower is missing one thing: music. Not only does it make your shower head’s stream more relaxing and powerful, it also adds a big boost to your morning routine by giving you a chance to listen to your favorite playlist.

item20.itemDescription: First of all, I love inflatable travel pillows. They deflate, fold up compactly, and don’t take up much room. Second, what makes this pillow unique is that it features a hoodie attached to it so you can be extra comfortable in transit.

item21.itemDescription: This lovely star throne will help you spark your imagination as you daydream about getting more stuff.

item22.itemDescription: One of the biggest reasons some men grow out their beards: warmth. Now, you don’t need an facial hair to keep your face nice and cozy — you just need this hilarious hat and mask combo.

item23.itemDescription: If you’ve always found it a little annoying to try to saw homemade pizza using a typical breadknife, you need this pizza-specific set of shears.

item24.itemDescription: You are a gormet chef -- with your magical instapot you can make everything from yogurt to porrige... YUM

item25.itemName: Levoit Aria Natural Himalayan Crystal Sea Salt Lamp
item25.itemDescription: How beautiful and calming is this sea salt lamp? Let it fill your living room with warm light.

item26.itemDescription: Deluxe full-head sculpted latex mask with faux hair accents, environmental and non-toxic. Its creepy lifelike design enable you to surprise your families and friends, great for masquerade parties.

item27.itemDescription: The Ab Hancer will be your choice of six-pack defining tools this summer. It is light weight, is easy to hide under clothing, and dramatically enhances your abs!

item28.itemDescription: These are the largest googly eyes I own, and I own a lot of googly eyes. I challenge you to find larger googly eyes than this. I have secured my googly eyes to my bar using velcro stickers. If I want to relocate the googly eyes, I can simply apply the business end of a velcro sticker to wherever I want my googly eyes, and then BOOM, Googly City!

item29.itemName: Glow in the Dark Toilet Paper
item29.itemDescription: Toilet paper roll has a glow-in-the-dark coating. Novelty item, not intended for “actual” use. If used your rear may glow.

item30.itemDescription: The waffles come out of the iron in the shape of a keyboard, which is perfect for any breakfast-loving nerd.
